Our observations of the world around us, combined with our personal experiences, provide the raw material for creativity. These could be anything from interactions with others, exposure to different cultures, or encounters with nature
Taking time to reflect on our experiences, thoughts, and feelings allows us to process them deeply. This reflection can lead to new insights, connections, and ideas.
